items.description: Through experience and training the creature gains +2 to one ability score or +1 to two ability scores.
items.name: Ability Score Increase

items.description: When taking the rest action in combat restore an additional stamina point.
items.name: Catch you breath

items.description: When grappling a creature you may use the choke and submission actions
items.name: Submission Artist

items.description: Reduce the stamina cost of casting a spell by 1. This feat may be taken up to 4 times.
items.name: Spellcasting Adept.

items.description: Gain access to the taunt action.
items.name: Words will never hurt me.

items.description: Gain the ability to wield light armor, weapons, and shields. You may also wield two light weapons 1 handed or a medium weapon two handed.
items.name: Light Arms Adept

items.description: Gain the ability to wield medium armor, weapons, and shields. You may wield a medium weapon in one hand and a light weapon or shield in the other.
items.name: Medium Arms Adept

items.description: Gain the ability to wield Heavy armor, weapons, and shields. When wielding a light or medium weapon one-handed you may use a great-shield in the other hand.
items.name: Heavy Arms Adept

items.description: Add your insight modifier to defense rolls.
items.name: Divine Favor

items.description: On your turn you may make an additional standard action. ex: move, rest, maneuver.
items.name: Extra Action
items.prereqs: The character may only benefit from Extra Action once.

items.description: On your turn you may make an additional attack action.
items.name: Extra Attack
items.prereqs: A character may only benefit from the Extra Attack feat 3 times.

items.description: When wielding two  weapons you may make one attack with each weapon per attack action. All stamina costs still apply.
items.name: Dual Wielder

items.description:
None
When fighting unarmed you may make two attacks with different limbs when you take the attack action. Add your agility score mod to grapple and take down rolls.
items.name: Unarmed Fighting
